full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 162 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct 1 Q. What do we see here? 2 A. This is the stairway, or stairwell, that is located adjacent to and partially behind the elevator on the second floor, looking down towards the first floor. 5 MS. COMEY: Thank you. We can take that down, 6 Ms. Drescher. 7 Ms. Drescher, can we please now pull up for the 8 witness Government Exhibits 269, 271, 272, 273, 276, and 277. 9 Q. Mr. Parkinson, do you recognize those exhibits? 10 A. I do. 11 Q. What are they? 12 A. These are pictures of generally the master bedroom area. 13 Q. Do these exhibits fairly and accurately depict the master 14 bedroom area of 358 El Brillo Way as it appeared on October 20, 15 2005? 16 A. True. 17 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers Exhibits 18 269, 271, 272, 273, 276, and 277 in evidence. 19 MR. EVERDELL: Your Honor, they flipped by before I 20 had a chance to see them. Do you mind if I take two seconds? 21 THE COURT: No, go ahead. Of course. 22 (Pause) 23 MR. EVERDELL: No objection, your Honor. 24 THE COURT: Thank you. 25 GX 269, 271, 272, 273, 276, and 277 are admitted. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018263
